rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 18 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 3:25 AM, 27 June 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Rizal, Cavite, Quezon and Laguna within the next 3 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Bulacan(Bulakan, Obando), Metro Manila(Manila, Quezon City, Malabon, Valenzuela, Navotas, Caloocan), Pampanga(Masantol, Macabebe), Bataan(Bagac) and Zambales(San Antonio) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
